data.title: Almere City FC vs Feyenoord live score, H2H and lineups
data.meta_description: Almere City FC Feyenoord live score (and video online live stream) starts on 10 Nov 2024 at 11:15 UTC time at Yanmar Stadion stadium, Almere city, Netherlands in Eredivisie, Netherlands.
data.text:
On Sofascore livescore you can find all previous Almere City FC vs Feyenoord results sorted by their H2H matches. Sofascore also provides the best way to follow the live score of this game with various sports features. Therefore, you can:

Find out who scored in a live match

Get real-time information on which team is dominating the match using the Attack Momentum

Follow detailed statistics such as ball possession, shots, corner kicks, big chances created, cards, key passes, duels and more

Check all head to head matches – for instance, in the last season Almere City FC and Feyenoord played 2 games against each other

Track all home and away games for each team in the Eredivisie

Check out how Sofascore community votes on which team is more likely to win this match.

All of these features can help you decide on Almere City FC vs. Feyenoord game prediction. Even though Sofascore doesn't offer direct betting, it provides the best odds and shows you which sites offer live betting. Live U-TV odds are viewable on Sofascore's Football live score section.

Where to watch Almere City FC vs. Feyenoord ? Under TV Channels section you can find the list of all channels that broadcast Almere City FC – Feyenoord live match. You can also live stream this match through our betting partners or click on any links on Sofascore for a legal live stream.

Event details:

NAME: Almere City FC - Feyenoord

DATE: 10 Nov 2024

TIME: 11:15 UTC

VENUE: Yanmar Stadion, Almere, Netherlands

Sofascore livescore is available as iPhone and iPad app, Android app on Google Play and Windows phone app. You can find us in all stores on different languages as "Sofascore". Install Sofascore app on and follow Almere City FC Feyenoord live on your mobile!
